How many people are affected by 15q13.3 microdeletion ?,"15q13.3 microdeletion likely occurs in about 1 in 40,000 people in the general population. It appears to be more common in people with intellectual disability, epilepsy, schizophrenia, or autism spectrum disorders.",GHR,15q13.3 microdeletion
